title-group.article-title: Conjugacy Classes in Finite Permutation Groups via Homomorphic Images

abstract.p: The lifting of results from factor groups to the full group is a standard technique for solvable groups. This paper shows how to utilize this approach in the case of non-solvable normal subgroups to compute the conjugacy classes of a finite group.
